problems.ins:
🍂 I prefer to be with people who have the same ideas and tastes as myself. 
🍂 I get very upset when things around me arent in their place. 
🍂 Any solution to a problem is better than remaining in a state of uncertainty.

🍂 I don't like to go into a situation without knowing what I can expect from it. 
🍂 I don't like situations that are uncertain.

🍂 I prefer things to which I am used to those I do not know, and cannot predict. 
🍂 I like to have the responsibility of handling a situation that requires a lot of thinking

🍂 I am anxious that I will fall short of my responsibilities and obligations. 
🍂 I often think about the person I an afraid I might become in the future. 
🍂 I often worry that I will fail to accomplish my academic goals. 
🍂 I am more oriented toward preventing losses than I am toward achieving gains. 
🍂 I frequently think how I can prevent failures in my life.

🍂 I typically focus on the success I hope to achieve in the future. 
🍂 I frequently imagine how I will achieve my hopes and aspirations. 
🍂 I see myself as someone who is primarily striving to reach my [ideal self]-to fulfill my hope, wishes, and aspirations.

🍂 I am confident I get the success I deserve in life. 
🍂 I feel depressed. When I try, I succeed. 
🍂 I do not feel in control of my work. 
🍂 I am capable of coping with most of my problems.

🍂 The certainty of death makes life meaningless. 
🍂 Getting old worries me. 
🍂 The sight of a corpse deeply chocks me. 
🍂 I often think I may have a serious disease.

🍂 Equal distribution of resources is a possibility for our society. 
🍂 It is unfair to have an economic system which produces extreme wealth and extreme poverty at the same time.

🍂 To get ahead in life, it is sometimes necessary to step on other groups. 
🍂 If certain groups of people stayed in their place, we would have fewer problems. 
🍂 Sometimes other groups must be kept in their place.
